title: Remove Caffeine footer branding line

requirements.text: Remove the Caffeine branding footer line by deleting the second paragraph element in the Landing Page footer (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/footer[1]/div[1]/div[1]/p[2]) that currently renders “Built with … using caffeine.ai”, including its heart icon and outbound link.

quotes: remove the caffeine branding from the website

acceptanceCriteria: On the public landing page, the footer shows only the copyright line and no longer displays the “Built with … using caffeine.ai” line.
There is no remaining hyperlink to https://caffeine.ai/ in that footer area.
No other footer/header content is changed outside the selected element.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/footer[1]/div[1]/div[1]/p[2].
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Removing or replacing branding in other parts of the site (header, metadata, loading states, admin/student dashboards) unless explicitly selected/requested.
Adding replacement branding, logos, or new footer content.
